gurmukhi: ਅਾਦਿ ਪਰਮਾਦਿ ਬਿਸਮਾਦਿ ਗੁਰੲੇ ਨੇਮਹ ਪ੍ਰਗਟ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਜੋਤਿ ਰਾਖੀ
transliteration: Aadi Paramaadi Bisamaadi Guray Naymaha , Pragat Pooran Braham Joti Raakhee ?
translation: Salutation to the True Guru the wondrous form of the (root of all) Lord, in whom God Himself has lodged His light effulgent.

gurmukhi: ਮਿਲਿ ਚਤੁਰ ਬਰਨ ੲਿਕ ਬਰਨ ਹੁੲਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗ ਸਹਜ ਧੁਨਿ ਕੀਰਤਨ ਸਬਦ ਸਾਖੀ
transliteration: Mili Chatur Baran Ik Baran Hui Saadhasanga , Sahaj Dhouni Keeratan Sabad Saakhee ?
translation: In the congregation assembled before God-like True Guru, praises of the Lord are sung and recited. All four varnas (caste based sections of the society) then integrate into one caste society.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਮ ਨਿਹਕਾਮ ਨਿਜ ਧਾਮ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸ੍ਵਨ ਧੁਨਿ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸੁਮਤਿ ਅਲਖ ਲਾਖੀ
transliteration: Naam Nihakaam Nij Dhaam Gursikh Sravana , Dhouni Gursikh Soumati Alakh Laakhee ?
translation: A Sikh of the Guru whose base is Lord's name, listens to the melodious paeans of the Lord's praise. He then realises his self that helps him perceive the imperceptible.

gurmukhi: ਕਿੰਚਤ ਕਟਾਛ ਕਰਿ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਦੈ ਜਾਹਿ ਲੈ ਤਾਹਿ ਅਵਗਾਹਿ ਪ੍ਰਿਅੈ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਿ ਚਾਖੀ ||੧੪੪||
transliteration: Kinchat Kataachh Kari Kripaa Dai Jaahi Lai , Taahi Avagaahi Priai Preeti Chaakhee ?144?
translation: The True Guru showers his benediction in very small measure on such a person who gets engrossed in it and relishes the loving elixir of Lord's love. (144)
